document_title: Sudeck syndrome: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, treatment
subsection_content: Sudeck syndrome or sympathetic dystrophic pain is a condition of pain and dystrophy due to dysfunction of the sympathetic nervous system, leading to severe bone calcium loss, causing reduced mobility. The disease has typical symptoms such as burning pain, swelling of the limbs, skin disorders such as skin atrophy, increased sweating, and signs of vasomotor disorders.
subsection_title: hoi chung sudeck.json. What is Sudeck syndrome?
subsection_data:
hoi chung sudeck.json. What is Sudeck syndrome?
Sudeck syndrome or sympathetic dystrophic pain is a condition of pain and dystrophy due to dysfunction of the sympathetic nervous system, leading to severe bone calcium loss, causing reduced mobility. The disease has typical symptoms such as burning pain, swelling of the limbs, skin disorders such as skin atrophy, increased sweating, and signs of vasomotor disorders.
